website_summaries.verdict: Extra-slim and made for several MacBook and iMac models, this flexible and durable silicone cover adds a pop of color to any computer.
pros: Cost-effective while still providing excellent protection from spills, dust, dirt, and hair
Users love the cheerful rainbow pattern
Letters and symbols match up perfectly with those on the keys
Holds up well even after long periods of use
cons: Cover may muffle the speakers if they're placed under the keyboard
Is somewhat hard to see keys if typing in the dark

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: This product really works great on my MacBook Pro 13". It doesn't slide around, or make the keys hard to use. Also, it really seals the keyboard from dust. I LOVE the color, as it is very bright and cheerful. However, in several places, little specks of color are missing, or an opposite color has been splashed on a key. Furthermore, the 'caps lock' button does NOT line up with the indicator light. Therefore, you cannot tell whether caps lock is on or not. For the most part though, it is a nice cover. I would buy it again, because of the pricing and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: hazeleyedhan

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy a dark color!!
customer_reviews.text: Must pay attention to the color you choose. I bought the rainbow one, and even with the backlighted keys, I could not see the lettering on the purple keys. I'm basically a touch typist, but still it's nice to see the lettering on the keys. While the yellow allowed the letters printed on the rubber to be seen, the dark colors did not. It was miserable. After five days, I exchanged it with Amazon for a yellow one and boom, I can see what I'm doing again. Nice fit on the keyboard of a 2015 MacBook Pro. I like that it prevents key wear.
customer_reviews.author: WayneChicagoTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty- blocks all the lights on keys.
customer_reviews.text: First, I think the colors look great! And it fits well, like a moshi keyboard cover I've had- but there are two things I don't like about it- It completely covers the entire top part of the key, so this means that you can't see the caps light on at all when you are using it. Likewise, because the letters aren't clear, it completely blocks any of the keyboard light that is standard on the macbook pro. If using the computer in the dark, having those lights can be a big help, and this cover would block all of that. Overall, very colorful and pretty, but would like them to fix at least the caps lock light.
customer_reviews.author: Kharisma

customer_reviews.title: Like it, not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing on the laptop with this new skin. I like the colors. Became addicted to this type of surface with my other laptop. Love the texture. I have slightly long nails and it buffers them against the keys. Plus it's nice to see the color while typing. The only complaint I have: It doesn't lie flat on the edge. My other one I bought at the Apple store, and it's perfect, but was $25. This one is more opaque, colors are vibrant. But the space bar edge is warped. Kind of annoying, doesn't affect the use of it though.
customer_reviews.author: T. Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Kuzy - Rainbow Keyboard Cover Silicon Skin
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on my keyboard when people see this on my Mac. It does not hinder the backlighting and gives a nice contrast to the keyboard. The skin does not slip and adds protection from dirt and debris getting down in the keys. I was skeptical of having a cover on the keyboard, but have no complaints in using this item and would buy another in the future should this one need replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Atrinket

customer_reviews.title: Durable form
customer_reviews.text: I have had this keyboard cover for a year and a half. There are no rips, holes, or melted/warped parts, it has kept its shape. The color is less vivid than when I bought it and a few keys have lost either some of the color or the text, but it is still pretty and for it to hold up when I'm on my computer everyday for a few hours with all that hand grease and grossness I'm just glad that this cover took the abuse and not my computer.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This cover was totally worth the money - I get compliments on it all the time! It fits my Mac Air perfectly and has molded silicone that makes it waterproof and cat hair proof, which was what I really needed it for. You can just lift it off and wash it off/blow it off. It's not foolproof and I'm sure if you spill a full cup of anything on your keyboard, it will probably get damaged, but for minor spillage and every day dust and grime, it works perfectly. For the price, I feel like it was totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: creativekristy

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: For such an inexpensive item, I get so many compliments on this keyboard cover. Colors are bright and vibrant! Have had it only two weeks, so I can’t speak to wear yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B

customer_reviews.title: A good keyboard cover
customer_reviews.text: Any of the silicon keyboard covers will keep the keyboard clean and prevent dust and whatnot from falling through the spaces around the keys. But this one is so bright and vibrant, it almost makes one happy just to look at it. The buttons are colored, but the rest of the skin is clear, unlike many of the solid-colored ones, and that gives it a neater appearance. The fit is pretty much perfect on the alpha-numeric and function keys, but I took away one star because the fit isn't quite as tight over the space bar as it is everywhere else. It doesn't affect performance, but you can see it.
customer_reviews.author: HaikuCat

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my laptop look nice and tidy
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much....saves me tons of time when cleaning the keys for dirt...as I can simply remove the item to wash it if I clean my laptop...it keeps my laptop to look nice and most of all tidy all the time....Secondly, the lights from the Mac keys still reflects around the keys letters, with these two figured out, I give it a 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Sherwin

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Cute, CUTE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers have mentioned, this is a really colorful keyboard cover. It came in four days and was easy to install. Fits my MacBook Air 13 inch great! I had two problems with this cover, First, there was a tiny tear and scratch on the cover, but not enough to make me send it back. Second, the power button on my MacBook Air is covered by and eject symbol on the cover. Not difficult to remember since there isn't anything to eject on the MacBook Air. Overall, I love it and I get lots of compliments on this cool looking cover.
customer_reviews.author: K. Key

customer_reviews.title: I love this keyboard cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard cover! I get a lot of complements on it. The only thing I don't like is that it has left some marks on my screen after time since you are using your oily fingers to type and that residue transfers to the screen when you shut it.
customer_reviews.author: D.Pit

customer_reviews.title: Happily Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived within 7 days, which is exceptional considering the items are being shipped to an APO address. The product fit perfectly to MacBook Pro with no problem, and makes my MacBook Pro look awesome while providing protection from the dust here while im in Afghanistan. The combination of colors are very beautiful, bright and eye catching. The keyboard cover doesn't interfere with the natural illumination of the keyboard back lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Paw Paw

customer_reviews.title: Just as vibrant as photo.
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about using one of these in the first place but it has turned out to be fantastic. Not only does it protect my keys from wear and tear, and it keeps misc mystery items from falling between the cracks; but it looks amazing and I receive compliments all the time. It is not difficult to type with it on at all. It was strange at first but I was used to it rather quickly. It is just strange because it makes the keys sound almost silent when you are typing which really is a benefit to me anyway.
customer_reviews.author: H. M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fun but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I loved the rainbow colors of this keyboard cover. It makes me smile when I open my laptop. It seems like it will do a good job protecting the keyboard from small amounts of liquid or debris. It is sort of flimsy. It does not fit snugly on the keys, but wiggles around a little when I type, which is a little irritating. the color is slightly off center on a couple of the keys. I would recommend it for the price I paid, but I would have liked a higher quality one for a little more money.
customer_reviews.author: NTreader

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Kuzy Rainbow Keyboard Cover for my new MacBook Air upon seeing my daughter's computer. True to what the product does, it protects my computer and they fit perfectly. However, I chose the dark colored item that impedes my typing. I should have stuck to the lighter color; my eyes attracted to the rainbow colors and was not paying attention to the darker side. But the product itself is great, next time, I should chose even a transparent color.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma Waltz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant that this keyboard cover wasn't going to look anything like this photo given but it is so beautiful & even more vibrant than the picture. The letters and other symbols line up perfectly with the Mac keyboard and the backlight still shines through wonderfully. It's also not sticky like some other keyboard covers are when you try to type. If you're thinking about getting this --DO IT. Plus it's super cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: A must for computers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two for our families computers. Excellent fit, we love the rainbow colors. Have used these over the years and love the performance of the product. A must for all computers, keeps lint, dust and other things out of your keyboard. Highly recommend. Also it slightly cushions your keys for less wear on your fingers. I write novels and find this very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee J.

customer_reviews.title: Fits my laptop
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and it fits correctly on my laptop. But when it is on I cannot close my laptop completely. There is a raised lip around each letter and it keeps it from closing.
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors, fits nicely
customer_reviews.text: I have the Macbook Pro... this thing fit it perfectly and the colors are so vivid, it looks almost cartoon-like.... but not as pastel as the photo looks on here. I just got it yesterday, so I can't speak to its longevity, but it's well-made and seems like it'll hold out for a while. Also, just a note, in case you're doing a lot of typing on your laptop, typing requires a little bit more effort because it adds a little bit of a cushion to the keys... might take some re-adjusting to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Ramie

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors of these skins
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors of these skins, and they're a bit more substantial than some of the others I've bought, so I'm hoping it will last longer. Keeps animal fur and moisture out of the keys. Highly recommend -- I've gotten lots of compliments in it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Taylor

customer_reviews.title: it only took a few days and I feel much better having this protector on my laptop
customer_reviews.text: At first it as difficult to get used to the 'feel' of silicone over the keys, since I was used to typing on the slick plastic keys. However, it only took a few days and I feel much better having this protector on my laptop. I also love the color (purchased the rainbow cover). Overall, I give the product 5 stars as it is a great value and lowers my anxiety when working on my laptop around my twin 3 year olds ;)
customer_reviews.author: AmaGirl7

customer_reviews.title: fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Macbook since I have already "juiced" one a couple of years ago. I thought it might make it overheat but Apple's forum says MacBooks ventilate from back... so no worries. It does make it harder to see backlit keyboard so I just put it on when I have something liquid nearby.
customer_reviews.author: Teri L

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of compliments on this keyboard cover. It did not last as long as I would have liked, within a few months it was bowing too much at the space bar, but I kept it on for another 6 months anyway. This is my 2nd one since I'm sacrificing this small inconvenience for how nice it looks, and that it does keep my keyboard debris free.
customer_reviews.author: pinky

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the KUZY thinking it wouldn't be much better, but I wanted the rainbow colors
customer_reviews.text: I had a keyboard cover that came with a bundle I bought and I wasn't impressed with it at all. I ordered the KUZY thinking it wouldn't be much better, but I wanted the rainbow colors, and for $6.95 it was worth a try. I LOVE this keyboard cover. IT fits much better and looks much better than the one that came in my bundle. I will definitely order more of them in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chiudioni

customer_reviews.title: Great colors/fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It came quickly, and the colors are just as I expected - vibrant and rich. It fits my MacBook with Retina Display perfectly. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: MusCharlie

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: So worth it to cover the keys. Ive used this for approx 6 months. The colors/numbers are vibrant and haven't worn down or faded. I receive so many compliments because it looks very cool. This was a gift and I loved it. Perfect for teens and college students, or hip adults, haha. Covers the keys but the lighted keyboard still shows around the keys.
customer_reviews.author: vicsor

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy the colorful keyboard and it was big hit with ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the colorful keyboard and it was big hit with my Grandkids also. Puts a fun spin on opening up my laptop and after spilling coffee one morning I would not be without it. I was lucky that it did no harm to my laptop, so ordered this asap. Fits beautifully on my MAC. The only problem is that I cannot see the light on the Upper Case anymore. Not a huge problem compared to allowing moisture into the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Colors, Cheap Ink
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the pretty colors, and that has been fine all around for me, it's exactly as described, so this doesn't bother me. But for anyone who doesn't know exactly where letters and keys are on the keyboard, do NOT get this. After less than a day with this cover on the letters on the keys started to rub off; now I have almost none of the letters and few of anything else. The colors remained, so it just looks like a blank rainbow, and I wouldn't get this if you need to look down at the keys before typing anything.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is the prettiest keyboard cover I have ever seen. Definitely recommend. Fits beautifully. Love, love, love. Only "downfall" is if you don't know where the keys are, it might be a little difficult in the dark....otherwise, perfect! UPDATE: I put a picture up and it seems Kuzy removed it, not sure why?!?! It was a great picture showing how it looked on my Macbook Pro!
customer_reviews.author: DDinLI

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard Cover!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the keyboard! Colors are not quite as bright as the picture appears, but they're still very nice. I really like the feel as I'm typing, and it's super easy to clean. FYI: The keyboard is too thick for the lights under the keys to shine through. This isn't a problem during the day (or if you know where the keys are), but might be a problem if you plan on working in low-light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This is a great keyboard cover!
customer_reviews.text: I love this because it's RAINBOW and doesn't slip around whatsoever. I had keyboard stickers on my last laptop, which rubbed off and left sticky stuff everywhere (...hmmm...) ---- this takes care of that problem. Perfect. I can take it off to clean it whenever I want and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: I like the colors and the fact that it protects my ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors and the fact that it protects my keyboard. I don't like the stickiness of the board - the regular keyboard allows my fingers to slide on and off - making typing easier. Maybe I'll get used to it. But it feels strange and makes typing a bit more error prone.
customer_reviews.author: dehei

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and fits perfectly! It gets a lot of comments and I have to peel the silicone off to prove to them that it is actually just one cover piece! This is my second Kuzy so far and will likely add more colors/patterns soon.
customer_reviews.author: Bello

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this. Very easy to out in
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this. Very easy to out in. She's 12 and did it herself. Bought a second one from a different site and she expected it was the same type of material but it was a sticker, not like this brand. This brand is nice because you can easily change it out to change the look of your computer, which is fun for the kids. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Kiltz

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun cover to use. I take my laptop to do observations in classrooms and have had high school students and staff members walk over to comment on my "cool cover." Fits the keyboard perfectly and love the look. The only issue is that six of the letters wore off. I was thinking of getting a fine tip marker to fill them in again, but for now it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but a little harder to type.
customer_reviews.text: I put this on the wireless keyboard I use with my desktop iMac. It fits great, but definitely makes typing a little more challenging. You need to hit the keys a little harder than you are used to. That being said, it is super cute and I hope that with time I will get used to it and it won't be noticeable...
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: amazing design but quality was ok
customer_reviews.text: I just received by rainbow silicone cover skin for my mac. The delivery was very speedy and I appreciate that very much. I absolutely love the design, it's amazing, but the skin is very very thin, which doesn't sit the best over the keys. it kinda has gaps or hills and doesn't all the way lay flat. I have ordered other inexpensive ones that were a little bit thicker but hey for $6 including shipping you get what you pay for... overall I love it so far just wish it was thicker to protect better.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Cute Kuzy Keyboard Cover
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely way. Good packaging. Great color. Fits the keyboard perfectly. Easily placed and removed from keyboard. Like others have said it makes typing a little difficult so I'm not liking that at all. I remove it when I'm typing because it slows me down and makes my fingers tired. Use it for protection in case of any accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept of the product keeps the keys clean ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept of the product keeps the keys clean and from fading with heavy use. However with the Mac Book Air the keys light up and the cover does not allow the light through so I can't use it when I an trying to work and the other half is trying to sleep and the lights are off so I have to take the cover off
customer_reviews.author: TatooedGrma

customer_reviews.title: Kuzy rocks.
customer_reviews.text: I am a connoisseur of keyboard covers and nothing beats the price and fit of a Kuzy.
customer_reviews.author: bcauseirock

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Almost on a daily basis, I get a comment on how awesome my keyboard protector looks. The colors are bright and vibrant but not overpowering where it gets in the way of reading the keys. It snugly fits my 13" MacBook Pro and doesn't move as I type. The protector is great at keeping any dust from collecting directly on the keyboard or under the keys itself. I love it so much that I bought a few extra to keep as a reserve.
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: Rainbow at your fingertips
customer_reviews.text: This is still my favorite keyboard cover. Not just for the protection (which has been tested with my eating breakfast while using laptop habit) but the color remains true after long use. Slight wear on the black lettering after extended use but that is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Fits!
customer_reviews.text: Fits and looks awesome on my new 13" macbook pro however if your like me and need the lit keys to show the rainbow one that I chose has black writing on the keys so the light on the keys doesn't show through, will be purchasing the newer rainbow model from Kuzy which has white writing.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Lasted through lots of wear!
customer_reviews.text: About 18 months later, I finally had to replace this cover only because it was getting stretched out. The colors barely faded with all my typing, so I would say this was a really good product considering how much I've been using it. Got a lot of compliments on the keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: sonadora

customer_reviews.title: Attention Getting
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so the more frequently used letters wore off rather quickly, but if you needn't 'hunt and peck' - that's not a big issue. I travel a lot to present at conventions, and get a lot of comments about how 'pretty' my rainbow keyboard appears. Makes a life of academia more fun - Big Thumbs Up.
customer_reviews.author: Art Lover

customer_reviews.title: Thin, but Solid Cover
customer_reviews.text: As someone who constantly eats or drinks over the keyboard, having a keyboard cover is a must. I love silicone covers that cover any gaps, and this does just that. It doesn't leave a smear on the screen either - a problem I had with my old mac and keyboard cover.
customer_reviews.author: parypari87

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect, I have a 2011 Macbook Pro. Can't live without it.
customer_reviews.author: luckyfeet

customer_reviews.title: Over the rainbow for keyboard skin!
customer_reviews.text: This Kuzy skin fits on my MacBook Pro 13" perfectly and looks awesome. The keys are opaque with black font color for the letters. Sits snuggly on the keyboard and doesn't pop up unless you make an effort to peel it back. I love the umbra effect as it "bleeds" from one color to the next.
customer_reviews.author: marcy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this on my MacBook Air, I get complements all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard cover. Got it mainly to keep dust out, since I do a lot of wood cutting and have a dog. The only negative is that you can't see if the CAPS LOCK button is lit. You have to pull up the cover to see the light if you're not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Stark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the vibrant colors while simultaneously protecting my keyboard. I cannot tell they are there when typing.
customer_reviews.author: Afton Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Too dark - can’t see the keys.
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. The case is too dark and even though it illuminates - it’s hard to see the keys. Have to take it off at times.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Potter

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had seen this earlier !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know they made things like this. Ordered it right away when I saw it. Fits perfect over my keyboard. Well priced, love the colors AND protects my keyboard. Very easy to put on and you really don't notice any difference when using your keyboard while this is in place
customer_reviews.author: Penny Means

customer_reviews.title: love this keyboard protector
customer_reviews.text: Have had this quite some time now and am very please with the protection it provides. A little disappointed in the letters that I use most often have rubbed off and it confuses others who use my computer that don't type by feel. Always get compliments on the vibrant colors :D
customer_reviews.author: P. V.

customer_reviews.title: it fits well!
customer_reviews.text: It fits very well compared to the last one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Niwasae

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cute (but letters starting to fade)
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for the colors and design. I love it for brightening up my laptop and making typing fun. It fits perfectly on my new 13" Macbook Air (mid-2013 model). Three stars for quality. What I don't love is the quality of the lettering. I've been using the cover for a few days, and already, the letters on frequently-used keys are fading (E, T, I to be specific). I have long-ish nails, so perhaps that's a contributing factor. And it won't stop me from using the cover since I dont necessarily need the letters to type. But still, it's something to be aware of when you make this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tomoko M

customer_reviews.title: I get compliments on this keyboard cover all the time ...
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on this keyboard cover all the time! Fits my mac perfectly. Stood up for over two years with frequent use.. now time to get a new one as the vowels are getting worn out and have holes in them.
customer_reviews.author: NQ

customer_reviews.title: Cute and stuff
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. My only observation is that at night, the key letters and numbers don't shine though...wish they did. But I bought the rainbow one and it fits great and conforms to the keyboard very well. Plus, it's totally cute and stuff
customer_reviews.author: Kdude

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not useful
customer_reviews.text: I got a lot of compliments on this adorable keyboard cover while I was using it, but I gave up on using it pretty quickly. It didn't fit very well over my keyboard. It got loose and bumpy; it was unpleasant to type on. Because it was so inexpensive, I wasn't very upset about it not working out, but I would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex A.

customer_reviews.title: ... and helpful for protecting from spills but I didnt like the feel and found it hard to type with ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute and helpful for protecting from spills but I didnt like the feel and found it hard to type with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa LeBoeuf

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard cover fits perfectly well over the keys of my laptop and helps protect against spills. I homeschool my three young kids, so spills around the computer happen more often than I'd like. The cover also doesn't effect the functionality of the keyboard, other than softening the keys slightly and muffling the sound of clicking. I'm quite happy with it so far, and of course, my daughters LOVE the rainbow colors. :)
customer_reviews.author: MamaLynx

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard cover
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several keyboard covers and they always stretch out and become annoying. I have had this one for a while and it has not stretched out.
customer_reviews.author: Edshoe

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: product fits perfectly on my macbook pro 13' from 2010. the colors are very vibrant- although the rainbow pattern is slightly different on the actual product than the picture shows. it has more of a fading from color to color than i anticipated, but i still love it! would recommend if looking to brighten up and personalize your computer =]
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: I call this the cover for someone who can't pick ...
customer_reviews.text: I call this the cover for someone who can't pick a color. Everyone that sees it wants one. Keeps the key board clean and I don't have to worry as much accidents with food.
customer_reviews.author: lola

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far -- amusing to look at, easy to use. Typing on my keyboard is actually easier with this keyboard cover, and it doesn't make marks on the screen like some other covers do when the laptop is closed.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Cannot see the illuminated keyboard in the dark
customer_reviews.text: This looks great. The surface feel is great. However, It took away from the mac's illuminated keyboard. You can't see the keys in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J Lapid

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The cover makes it a little hard to type, and I usually take it off if I'm going to be typing a lot. But that's to be expected with pretty much any keyboard cover. My only real complaint, is that you can't really see the keyboard light through the skin. Overall, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Jackson

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the first one on 2012, 8 years after it was about time to buy a new one, and I bought the same 'cause it's really good!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits the keys perfectly, extremely flexible, bright clear colors. Aethetically very pleasing
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Stretches out after a while
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about having something to protect my keyboard, and this does that. However, it stretched out after a few months and no longer properly fits on the keys.
customer_reviews.author: KLove

customer_reviews.title: B-E-A-Utiful Keyboard Skin
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard cover is exactly as described, exactly as pictured. When you have the skin on, the keys do not light up because there is a skin.. but I don't find this any issue with this. I love that its all different colors! Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kassidy

customer_reviews.title: Sure is pretty
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't use it except that I know it is protecting my keyboard. There seems to be a little air pocket between the keys and the cover so sometimes, when I think I've hit a key I haven't. It sure is colorful though
customer_reviews.author: S Q Lund

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Cute
customer_reviews.text: I get asked constantly where I got this thing. Slips on easily, keeps your keyboard clean, and does not increase your laptop's heat output. (A concern I had) The colors have started to scrape off the silicone, though, after only a few months. It's cheap, though, so I think I've gotten a fair amount of use out of it. Besides, with paint missing, it is still functional.
customer_reviews.author: C. L.

customer_reviews.title: Rainbow Keyboard Cover
customer_reviews.text: I really like my rainbow keypad cover. It's very bright and colorful. My only complaint would be that you cannot see if caps lock is on or not. There is a black dot instead of a hole or clear spot to see through.
customer_reviews.author: KK61350

customer_reviews.title: Months later and it still looks brand new!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for months now and it still looks brand new! I love the material, too. It holds steady and firm, unlike other silicon keyboard covers I've bought in the past which are much more flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Desjardins

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one I've purchased. My only ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've purchased. My only real problem with the first one was the letters wore off with continued usage. The first one lasted me almost 3 years and would have lasted longer if I hadn't had to show everyone what I meant when I said it was just a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Fria

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is very colorful and appealing to look at while I'm typing or surfing the net. The material is strong and fits over the keyboard this was a great purchase and it arrived very quickly I was very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Shopper

customer_reviews.title: So much fun. Makes my boring laptop cuter
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. Makes my boring laptop cuter. It's not a super snug fit though, but not hard to type.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Colors are vibrant and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 year old, so having a keyboard cover was a necessity. Works perfectly. I's been on for about a year now and has saved my mac from drink spills, crumbs, and countless other disasters! Colors are vibrant and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Simple, yet great little product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this keyboard silicon cover skin for my daughter's MacBook Pro. The item was exactly as described and does a good job of dressing up the MacBook. Typing on the cover skin is not a problem. Shipping on this item was quick. All in all, I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This fits well on my MacBook and keeps the dust and dirt out of the keyboard. I bought a couple of different colors to change our!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Gahm

customer_reviews.title: Great colorful key board cover
customer_reviews.text: Very cool, fits on our mac laptop. Great feel to it, daughter loves it. Also great price.
customer_reviews.author: MEC

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard cover. It is very unique, and I love the design. It works pretty well, too. It fits my Macbook Pro keyboard perfectly. It is great for protecting your keyboard from crumbs, and possibly even a small spill. I have had mine for a few months, and it has held up pretty well. It is a tiny bit warped, but nothing too serious. There are other keyboard covers available that are just as great for a much cheaper price, but they don't look as cool.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Rainbow Keyboard Silicone Cover Skin for MacBook
customer_reviews.text: Not only are you getting to keep dirt out of your keyboard, you have a conversation piece. Do not use my Mac Book out in public much, but when I do, more people want to find out what I did to the keyboard. Heck, I even got some sign-ups to join in my down line in GVO “MeetCheap Conference rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Gene E. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to protect my MacBook Air keyboard and to also give it a little spunk. The colors are very bright and they flow into each other well. It's easy to type on and it seems to stay put well.
customer_reviews.author: haulie

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: My partner was very excited to get it, said that it doesn't get in the way of typing at all (and she typically hates anything to do with computers, so I believe her when she says it's just like typing on the original keyboard). One drawback, the keyboard lights don't shine through, so when she's looking for a key in the dark she has difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Boop

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover Overall
customer_reviews.text: The color is exactly like what the pictures show here, which is great. Silicone keyboard cover does make typing not as smooth as it is without the cover. And the cover makes it difficult to see whether the "CapsLock" light is on. I still like it, but it may not be for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: underbreath

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I surprised my daughter by having this shipped to her on Valentines day. She loved it. She said it fits perfectly and makes it easier to type on her Mac than the one she already had. Plus, being the artsy type, she loved the colors.
customer_reviews.author: C. Allen

customer_reviews.title: great protection for the computer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My girls are always on their computers and have food and drinks around. These really protect their computer keyboards. Will buy more in the future for other computers we buy.
customer_reviews.author: debbielepp

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard cover and I get a ton of compliments on it. It looks like each key is individually painted when you put it on. However, you should be aware that the backlight does not shine through the letters, as the letters on the cover are black. There is still slight luminescence around the border of the keys, though. I have had this cover on my laptop since Christmas and none of the paint or letters have rubbed off even with everyday use. I love this product and would definitely recommend purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: z. hill

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover skin! It does give a little different feel, that takes about 3-4 days to get used to, but it is worth the adjustment. I love the fun colors and love knowing my keys are staying clean. So far I have had one friend, and two adult children insist they HAVE to have one. It would have been nice to pay a little less for shipping (since it costs only cents to send, in a larger flat envelope), but that's my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Love this. Keeps my keyboard dust free. Get tons of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Lou domo

customer_reviews.title: Works, fun colours
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order, but you can close your computer with this on the board, major fun multi colour, doesn't move around and makes me happy to look at. I would recommend to anybody who likes a little protection for their keyboard and a little extra colour in their life.
customer_reviews.author: [1persons opinion

customer_reviews.title: Distinctive
customer_reviews.text: Trying to keep a computer keyboard clean is a challenge in this modern world. I can't think of a more novel way to do just that than with this keyboard cover. What an appealing array of colors!
customer_reviews.author: Kate70

customer_reviews.title: Love this keyboard cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this keyboard cover. When I have been out in public or meeting with my Mac I have had people ask me if my computer was a special order. I may have said "yes" a couple of times. ;)
customer_reviews.author: SneauxDayz

customer_reviews.title: So satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: So satisfied. I like when I open my laptop to all the colors of the rainbow. Really neat! As expected & arrived timely
customer_reviews.author: Journee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with iPearl mCover Hard Shell Case in pink for my new Macbook Pro. Looks amazing. Fits the keyboard nicely and honestly it didn't take me more than a few hours to get used to typing on it. For the price, you just can't beat it. If/when it ever does wear out, I will be purchasing this product again. Buy it- you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: angiel15

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love how this covers the keys so they don't get dirty and it's really cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: SIMONA O

customer_reviews.title: Epic product
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard cover. It makes me happy every time I open the computer and I get compliments on it all the time. It should be cleaned periodically, however, because it will grease up your screen.
customer_reviews.author: prairie_nurse

feature_bullets: Perfect fit for the All Latest MacBook Pro 13, 15, 17 with or w/out Retina Display -- Release 2015 / 2014 / 2013 / 2012 and MacBook Air 13" and iMac Wireless Keyboard
Every key is individually molded and specially printed on clear silicone for a long lasting professional look.
Design to provide the full protection for your Macbook keyboard against dust spills, key wear and more. Manufactured to the Highest Quality Available
Extra slim silicone skin, made it easier for typing. The keywords are printed on the keyboard cover
Flexible, washable, easy to apply and remove for cleaning or disinfecting
